resources.string: Sending SMS with code. \nWait for answer
Using this command You can get information about nearest BTS station of phone you texted.
Please see About to find out more information.
There is no answer for that command.
If InsideSpy receive command to get information about nearest BTS, it will produce answer containing CID, LAC, MCC, MNC and text it.
Using this command You can get information about location of phone you texted.
If InsideSpy receive command to get information about location, it will produce answer containing latitude and longitude and text it.
Using this command You can make vibrate phone you texted.
